about_the_game:
"Man is very strong, he always believes in a better and happier tomorrow." - Aleksander Kamiński, Stones for the Lair

Imagine waking up in the middle of the snowy night to the sounds of a falling sky. Explosions, fire, chaos, the frightened whimper of your child. It’s your turn: now or never, slip away from your enemies before it's too late…

PROTECT YOUR FAMILY

As a father, since the first breath of your child, you’ve always known the responsibility relies on your shoulders… but the stakes were never that high. Do what you must to keep your wife and son alive.

FARM, HUNT, IMPROVISE

Nothing can be taken for granted now. You will have to earn every meal and bargain for each piece of comfort for you and your family using extreme measures. Hunt for wild animals, make forest recipes, and, as a farmer, use your skills to create a new home during the occupation…

SURVIVE 365 DAYS

Sneak, wait for your moment, ATTACK! Every. Second. Counts. Your enemies are cunning and trained. Can you handle that while being "just" a farmer? Your everyday abilities may come in handy so don’t underestimate yourself and keep trying!

After all, you’ve got nothing to lose and everything to gain.

short_description: Face the cruel reality of World War II as an ordinary Farmer. Use your skills as your greatest weapon. Protect your family, fight and hunt to survive 365 days under the occupation.
